name: Floaty Bird
description:
Peter the Pigeon doesn't fly so well, but joined together with his trusty red balloon he's a great glider! 

Dodge arrows by diving below them or with some good timing float over them. The balloon is so powerful Peter the Pigeon is always floating upward, so he never needs to flap, only dip down into a dive.

All Art, Music, Sounds, and Code we're created by Tate. Using:
Pixel Art: Aseprite
Music: Bosca Ceoil
Sounds: Bfxr
Code: Visual Studio Code

Dev Note: This was the first game made solo, I'm very new to Unity and C# and it could be 1000x better. But I am pleased to have taken part in The GMTK Game Jam 2021. Enjoy.

- Apologies it is only available for download for Mac. I had issues installing Unity support for Web GL and Standalone PC Build Settings. Give it a quick watch the Gameplay on Youtube if you cannot play it yourself.
